# IDistributionContract
[Git Source](https://github.com/Uniswap/twap-auction/blob/91c505699ed85a7d0194c9a8cabc334c99e11f9f/src/interfaces/external/IDistributionContract.sol)

Interface for token distribution contracts.


## Functions
### onTokensReceived

Notify a distribution contract that it has received the tokens to distribute


```solidity
function onTokensReceived() external;
```
